resources.string: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

With a premium account you get:

 1. Unlimited transaction in all formats.

 2. Reduced Rate of Interest in all types of loans.

 3. Extra overdraft limit and more perks.

1. Your account has reached monthly transaction limit. $5.00 will be charged for every new transaction this month 

 2. You are eligible for a free add-on credit card. Contact support for more information.

 3. Our policies have been updated. Please visit our website to know more.
Your account now supports additional overdraft limit.\n\nLogon to our website to know more.
All banking operations will remain shut on \n %s from 01:00 AM to 06:00 AM for maintenance.
